channel.title: Bats on Science in Progress
channel.description: Recent content in Bats on Science in Progress

item.title: #12 - Anna Sjodin - What happens when things don't go as planned?
item.description: Anna’s a PhD student at University of Connecticut. She studies bat viruses which is super cool! We talk a little about Anna’s research, but this discussion we focus on methods for coping when things don’t go as planned in research or our overall grad school plans. Find Anna on social media here: Twitter: @Anna_Rose_Sjodin Instagram: @lady_virus_hunter website
